Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner"> class.
Gets all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"> objects available for the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes the designer with the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The designer host calls Initialize to initialize the component for the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void OnAutoFormat (object sender, EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig instance void OnAutoFormat(object sender, class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.EventArgs"> object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Called when an auto-format scheme has been applied to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Schemes are applied by the user to set the appearance of a control from a collection of predefined styles. Override this method to perform other actions that might be needed after a scheme is applied to a control.
